overview: The 'More Information' page provides healthcare service discovery through search, category filters, and sorting. It includes a sticky navigation bar, accessibility features, and dynamic service card rendering.
key_components: Sticky navigation bar with theme toggle
Service cards grid with skeleton loaders
interactions: Click skip link to jump to main content
Toggle dark/light theme via theme-toggle button
Type in search input to filter services
Click filter chips to apply category filters
Change sort dropdown to reorder services
data_flow: User input in search field triggers filtering logic
Filter chip clicks modify displayed service categories
Sort dropdown changes order of service cards
Service data fetched and rendered dynamically replacing skeleton loaders
accessibility: ARIA labels on navigation and interactive elements
Visually hidden labels for search input
analytics: Track search input usage and query terms
test_ideas: Verify skip link focuses main content
Ensure theme toggle updates UI state and persists preference
Test search input filters service cards dynamically
Confirm filter chips apply correct category filters
Check sort dropdown reorders services properly
Assert skeleton loaders replaced by service cards after data load
Run accessibility audit for ARIA compliance and keyboard navigation
